item.title: Reticulate: The Real Mind Meld
item.description: On the wrong page? Maybe you're looking for my first project? Click below! Link to project 1 Still here?? Nice. Let's look at how we can use R and Python together without wanting to tear your hair out in frustration: reticulate. #R-code chunk library(reticulate) lookalike <- "who is dr. woodward's celebrity look-alike?" #python code chunk one= "brian david gilbert" two= "and mathew gray gubler" #access R-defined objects with r. print(r.
